scripts.clean: rimraf dist dist-mv2 dist-mv3 extension-*.zip extension-*.xpi && mkdir -p dist
scripts.prebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run copy-assets
scripts.build:packages: pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:design-system && run-p build:background build:popup
scripts.build:zip: DIST_DIR=${DIST_DIR:-dist}; ZIP_BASENAME=${ZIP_BASENAME:-extension}; (cd "$DIST_DIR" && zip -r "../${ZIP_BASENAME}-chrome.zip" . && if [ "${MAKE_FIREFOX:-true}" = "true" ]; then zip -r "../${ZIP_BASENAME}-firefox.xpi" .; fi)
scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run build:zip
scripts.build:all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:mv2 && pnpm run build:mv3
scripts.build:all-variants: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:mv2 && pnpm run build:mv3 && pnpm run build:mv2:no-blocklist && pnpm run build:mv3:no-blocklist
scripts.predev: pnpm run clean && pnpm run copy-assets
scripts.test:coverage: run-p test:core:coverage test:background:coverage test:design-system:coverage test:popup:coverage && pnpm coverage:report && pnpm coverage:badge
